scripts.copyenv: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const rootEnv = path.join(__dirname, '.env'); if (!fs.existsSync(rootEnv)) { console.error('Root .env file not found'); process.exit(1); } const appsDir = path.join(__dirname, 'apps'); fs.readdirSync(appsDir).forEach(dir => { const fullDir = path.join(appsDir, dir); if (fs.statSync(fullDir).isDirectory() && !['.git', '.github', 'node_modules', '.turbo', '.next', '.vscode', 'dist', 'public', 'src', 'coverage', 'logs', '.devcontainer', '.yarn', 'target'].includes(dir)) { const dest = path.join(fullDir, '.env'); fs.copyFileSync(rootEnv, dest); console.log('Copied .env to ' + dest); } });"
